question: But-1-yne on reaction with dil. H₂SO₄ in presence of Hg²⁺ ions at 333 K gives :
images/f0b8c9d1-e2a3-1b8c-5d6e-789012345678.png
explanation: Hydration of alkynes in the presence of HgSO₄/H₂SO₄ follows Markovnikov's rule.
But-1-yne (CH₃-CH₂-C≡CH) adds water to form the enol CH₃-CH₂-C(OH)=CH₂.
This enol tautomerizes to the more stable ketone: Butan-2-one (CH₃-CH₂-CO-CH₃).
